Ceilometer¶

This Module contains the Ceilometer class. This class is for easy working with the cloud base height.

Ceilometer(start, end) The ceilometer is an instrument for detecting the cloud base height (CBH).

Radar¶

This Module contains the Radar class. This class is for easy working with the BCO radar data.

Radar(start, end[, device, version]) Class for working with radar data from Barbados.

Radiation¶

This Module contains the Radiation class. This class is for easy working with the Radiation data.

Radiation(start, end) Class for working with the Radiation Data from the BCO.

Surface Weather¶

This Module contains the SfcWeather class. This class is for easy working with data collected from the surface weather station (height ~ 20m) at the BCO site.

SfcWeather(start, end) Class for working with the data collected by the ground weather station.

Windlidar¶

This Module contains the Windlidar class. This class is for easy working with the BCO Windlidar data.

Windlidar(start, end) Class for working with the Windlidar Data from the BCO.
